useSelfClosingElements.description:
Description

Prevent extra closing tags for components without children.
JSX elements without children should be marked as self-closing. In JSX, it is valid for any element to be self-closing.
useSelfClosingElements.option: ignoreHtmlElementsSection titled “ignoreHtmlElements” Default:false This option allows you to specify whether to ignore checking native HTML elements. In the following example, when the option is set to “true”, it will not self close native HTML elements. 1{2 "//":"...",3 "options": {4 "ignoreHtmlElements": true5 }6} 1
